data.name: Aid Another
data.description: A few small words of encouragement go a long way
data.effect: You grant the ally advantage on their next d20 roll

data.name: Bull Rush
data.description: You yourself at your foe and push it back

hit.effect: You push the target 5', then shift 5' into the space it left.

data.name: Charge
data.description: You unleash a fierce cry then rush into combat
data.effect: You move up to your speed to a space adjacent to the target. Each step of movement must bring you closer to the target. Then, make a melee basic attack against the target.

data.name: Coup de grace
data.description: A killing blow to a defeated foe
data.target: One unconscious or otherwise helpless creature
data.effect: You make an attack against the target and automatically score a critical strike

data.name: Grab
data.description: Get Over Here!
data.requirement: You must have a hand free
data.target: One creature that is no more than one size category larger than you

hit.effect: You grab the target until the end of the next round. You can end this grab as a free action.

data.sustain: The grab persists for another round

data.name: Melee Basic Attack
data.description: You swing your sword

data.name: Ranged Basic Attack
data.description: You shoot your bow

data.name: Second Wind
data.description: You take a deep breath and get ready to continue the fight
data.effect: You spend a healing surge and gain a +2 bonus to all defenses until the end of the next round.

data.name: Shove
data.description: You yourself at your foe and push it back

data.name: Total Defense
data.description: You hunker down and focus on deflecting attacks
data.effect: Attacks against you have disadvantage until the end of the next round.

data.name: Crawl
data.description: Not exactly graceful but might avoid notice
data.effect: You move up to half your speed

data.name: Escape
data.description: You attempt to writhe free of the ogre's grip
data.effect: You make an Athletics or Acrobatics check to escape the grab. If the grab effect has a DC you roll against that, otherwise you make Athletics checks against the grabbing creature's Fortitude and Acrobatics checks against the grabbing creature's Reflex. If you succeed, you escape and can shift 5'.

data.name: Hop On
data.description: You vault onto your trusty steed
data.effect: You get on the target

data.name: Run
data.description: Run F0R-35T Run!
data.effect: You move up to your speed plus 10'. You have disadvantage on attack rolls and grant Edge to all attackers until the end of the next round.

data.name: Stand Up
data.description: You return to your feet
data.effect: If your space is unoccupied you stand up in it. If your space is occupied but there are adjacent unoccupied spaces you can shift 5' then stand up. If your and each adjacent space is occupied you can't stand up.

data.name: Shift
data.description: You move tactically to avoid a foes attacks
data.effect: You shift 5', which doesn't provoke opportunity attacks

data.name: Walk
data.description: You move with purpose
data.effect: You move up to your speed

data.name: Detect a Hidden Enemy
data.description: A bag of flour would make this easier
data.effect: You make a perception check against a hidden enemy's stealth check to find their location. (This doesn't negate any bonuses from cover, concealment, or invisibility, it just lets you know what space they're in and prevents them from gaining any benefits that require being hidden)

data.name: Drink a potion
data.description: You quaff the grape-tasting healing potion
data.effect: You imbibe the potion and gain its benefits

data.name: Drop prone
data.description: You dip, duck, dive, and dodge
data.effect: You fall prone

data.name: Open or close a door
data.description: You shut the door in the skeleton's face
data.effect: You open or close a door in an adjacent space

data.name: Pick up an item
data.description: 5 second rule
data.effect: You retrieve an item from the floor

data.name: Retrieve or Stow Item
data.description: You grab a potion from your belt
data.effect: You retrieve an item from an easily accessible location on your person, such as a belt pouch or weapon sheathe

data.name: Opportunity Attack
data.description: You smack a foe as it attempts to flee
data.trigger: An adjacent enemy you can see moves or makes a ranged attack
data.effect: You make a melee basic attack against the target

data.name: Drop held item
data.description: You respond to the heat metal spell by dropping your sword
data.effect: You drop an item to the floor in your current space

data.name: Spend an action point
data.description: Immigrant Song starts playing
data.requirement: You may only use this on your turn
data.effect:
Choose one of the following effects:
-Reroll any roll(d20 or damage)
-Force an enemy attack to reroll
-Take an extra standard action this turn
-Recharge a short rest power

data.name: Talk
data.description: You give your companions some quick directions
data.effect: You say a relatively short phrase or sentence
